itinerary.day_1: Colonial Fort walk, Dutch Hospital lunch, and sunset at Galle Face Green.
itinerary.day_2: Gangaramaya Temple and a boat ride on Beira Lake. Evening shopping at Pettah Market.
itinerary.day_3: Day trip to the Kelaniya Raja Maha Vihara and exploring the wetlands of Beddagana.
itinerary.day_4: Art gallery hopping in Colombo 07 and a farewell rooftop dinner overlooking the skyline.

itinerary.day_1: Full day exploring the UNESCO Galle Fort ramparts and boutiques.
itinerary.day_2: Surfing at Sahana Beach and visiting the Japanese Peace Pagoda.
itinerary.day_3: Boat safari in the Koggala Lake and visiting the Martin Wickramasinghe Museum.
itinerary.day_4: Whale watching in nearby Mirissa and evening at the Hikkaduwa Coral Reef.

itinerary.day_1: Sunrise climb of Sigiriya Rock Fortress followed by a village lunch.
itinerary.day_2: Exploring the Dambulla Cave Temple and the Golden Buddha statue.
itinerary.day_3: Hiking the Knuckles Mountain Range foothills and visiting a spice garden.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Nalanda Gedige and the Aluvihara Rock Temple.

itinerary.day_1: Temple of the Sacred Tooth Relic and a traditional Kandyan dance show.
itinerary.day_2: Royal Botanical Gardens in Peradeniya and a walk around Kandy Lake.
itinerary.day_3: Hike to the Hanthana Mountain Range and visit the Tea Museum.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Bahirawakanda Buddha statue and explore the Udawattakele Sanctuary.

itinerary.day_1: High tea at the Grand Hotel and a walk around Gregory Lake.
itinerary.day_2: Early morning trek at Horton Plains National Park to see World's End.
itinerary.day_3: Touring a Pedro Tea Factory and visiting the Seetha Amman Temple.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Hakgala Botanical Gardens and the Ambewela Farm.

itinerary.day_1: Cycling through the Sacred City ruins and the Jaya Sri Maha Bodhi.
itinerary.day_2: Climbing Mihintale Peak for sunset views of the ancient reservoirs.
itinerary.day_3: Exploring the Isurumuniya Rock Temple and the Twin Ponds (Kuttam Pokuna).
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Avukana Buddha statue and the Kala Wewa tank.

itinerary.day_1: Jaffna Fort and the Nallur Kandaswamy Kovil evening ceremony.
itinerary.day_2: Ferry to Delft Island to see the wild ponies and coral ruins.
itinerary.day_3: Dip in the Keerimalai Sacred Springs and visiting the Casuarina Beach.
itinerary.day_4: Exploring the Point Pedro lighthouse and the Kantharodai Viharaya.

itinerary.day_1: Snorkeling at Pigeon Island National Park and Nilaveli Beach.
itinerary.day_2: Visit Koneswaram Temple on 'Lovers Leap' and Fort Frederick.
itinerary.day_3: Relaxing at Marble Beach and hiking Diamond Hill.
itinerary.day_4: Visiting the Kanniya Hot Springs and the Trinco Whale Watching port.

itinerary.day_1: Full day leopard-spotting safari at Yala National Park.
itinerary.day_2: Bird watching at Bundala National Park and the salt lewayas.
itinerary.day_3: Visit the Kataragama Temple complex and the Kirinda Temple.
itinerary.day_4: Explore the Ridiyagama Safari Park and the Dry Zone Botanical Garden.

itinerary.day_1: Visit the Muthiyangana Raja Maha Vihara and Dunhinda Falls.
itinerary.day_2: Train journey to Ella and hiking Little Adam's Peak.
itinerary.day_3: Walk across the Nine Arch Bridge and explore Ravana Caves.
itinerary.day_4: Hike Ella Rock and visit the Lipton's Seat in nearby Haputale.

itinerary.day_1: Surfing at Arugam Bay and sunset at Elephant Rock.
itinerary.day_2: Wildlife safari in Kumana National Park (Bird sanctuary).
itinerary.day_3: Explore the Kudumbigala Monastery and the Panama Beach.
itinerary.day_4: Canoe safari in Pottuvil Lagoon and the Muhudu Maha Viharaya.

itinerary.day_1: Cycling through the Polonnaruwa Ancient City ruins.
itinerary.day_2: Evening safari at Minneriya National Park for 'The Gathering'.
itinerary.day_3: Visit the Parakrama Samudra and the Archaeological Museum.
itinerary.day_4: Explore the Medirigiriya Vatadage and the Somawathiya Stupa.

itinerary.day_1: Walking tour of Batticaloa Fort and the Kallady Bridge.
itinerary.day_2: Lagoon boat trip to hear the 'singing fish' and bird watching.
itinerary.day_3: Relaxing at Pasikudah Beach and snorkeling in the shallow bay.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Sathurukondan Wetlands and the local lighthouse.

itinerary.day_1: Dolphin watching in Kalpitiya and exploring the Dutch Fort.
itinerary.day_2: Kitesurfing lessons or relaxing at the Kalpitiya Lagoon.
itinerary.day_3: Full day safari at Wilpattu National Park (Western entrance).
itinerary.day_4: Explore the salt pans and the St. Anne’s Church in Talawila.

itinerary.day_1: Visiting a traditional Gem Mine and the Gem Museum.
itinerary.day_2: Hiking the classic route of Sri Pada (Adam's Peak).
itinerary.day_3: Exploring Sinharaja Rain Forest (UNESCO) - Kudawa entrance.
itinerary.day_4: Cooling off at Bopath Ella Falls and the Saman Devalaya.

itinerary.day_1: Visit Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage and the elephant river bath.
itinerary.day_2: Exploring the Saradiel Village (Uthuwankanda) and the rock hike.
itinerary.day_3: Visit the Millennium Elephant Foundation for an ethical walk.
itinerary.day_4: Hiking in the Bible Rock (Bathalegala) for mountain views.

itinerary.day_1: Climbing Ethagala (Elephant Rock) for the giant Buddha statue.
itinerary.day_2: Exploring the Panduwasnuwara ancient kingdom ruins.
itinerary.day_3: Visit the Yapahuwa Rock Fortress and its ornate stone stairs.
itinerary.day_4: Exploring the Ridi Vihara (Silver Temple) and Arankele Monastery.

itinerary.day_1: Explore the Star Fort and the Parevi Duwa temple island.
itinerary.day_2: Visit the Dondra Head Lighthouse and the Vishnu Devalaya.
itinerary.day_3: Snorkeling with sea turtles at Polhena Beach.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Wewurukannala Temple and the Hummanaya Blowhole.

itinerary.day_1: Visit the Kalutara Bodhiya and its hollow Stupa.
itinerary.day_2: Exploring the Richmond Castle and its colonial architecture.
itinerary.day_3: A day trip to the Brief Garden (Bevis Bawa's masterpiece).
itinerary.day_4: Calido Beach walk and visiting the Fa Hien Caves.

itinerary.day_1: Exploring the Maligawila Buddha Statue (largest free-standing).
itinerary.day_2: Safari at Gal Oya National Park (Boat safari).
itinerary.day_3: Visit the Veddah (Indigenous) community in Dambana.
itinerary.day_4: Hiking the Yudaganawa archaeological site and tank.

itinerary.day_1: Exploring the Negombo Fish Market and Dutch Canal boat ride.
itinerary.day_2: Relaxing at Negombo Beach and the St. Mary’s Church.
itinerary.day_3: Visit the Henarathgoda Botanical Garden (first rubber trees).
itinerary.day_4: Exploring the Pilikuththuwa Raja Maha Vihara cave temple.

itinerary.day_1: Crossing the Mannar Causeway and seeing the Baobab Tree.
itinerary.day_2: Visit the Thiruketheeswaram Temple and the Mannar Fort.
itinerary.day_3: Exploring the Talaimannar Pier and Adam's Bridge sandbanks.
itinerary.day_4: Bird watching at the Vankalai Sanctuary and Madhu Church.

itinerary.day_1: Visit the Vavuniya Museum and the local market culture.
itinerary.day_2: Exploring the Kanda Swamy Kovil and the Grand Mosque.
itinerary.day_3: Visit the ancient Madukanda Vihara and the nearby tank.
itinerary.day_4: Exploring the local agrarian life and the Pavakkulam tank.

itinerary.day_1: Relaxing at the untouched Mullaitivu Beach.
itinerary.day_2: Visit the Maritime and Naval History Museum.
itinerary.day_3: Exploring the Nanthikadal Lagoon for scenic views.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Oddusuddan Thaanthonreeswarar Temple.

itinerary.day_1: Visit the Elephant Pass War Memorial.
itinerary.day_2: Exploring the Iranamadu Tank and its engineering marvel.
itinerary.day_3: Learning about local agriculture at the Rice Research Center.
itinerary.day_4: Visit the Akkarayan Kulam and the local peace monuments.
